sqlMap.select: select count(*) from SERVICE where TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select Seq_Service.Nextval from dual
select Seq_Dir_Ser_List.Nextval from dual
select Seq_Func_2_Service.Nextval from dual
select Seq_Api.Nextval from dual

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RECNO, SERVICE_ID,CONTRACT_VERSION_ID,VERSION,SERVICE_VERSION,SERVICE_EN_NAME,SERVICE_CN_NAME,SERVICE_CODE,STATE, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW FROM (SELECT a.SERVICE_ID, a.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID, b.VERSION, a.SERVICE_VERSION, a.SERVICE_EN_NAME, a.SERVICE_CN_NAME, a.SERVICE_CODE, a.STATE, a.DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW FROM service a , CONTRACT_VERSION b where a.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID=b.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID and a.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
a.STATE = #state#
ORDER BY SERVICE_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#startRow# + #rows# - 1) ORDER BY ROWNUM) WHERE RECNO BETWEEN #startRow# AND (#startRow# + #rows# - 1)

SELECT a.*,b.*,c.contract_id FROM service a LEFT JOIN message_flow b on a.default_msg_flow=b.message_flow_id LEFT JOIN contract_version c on a.contract_version_id = c.contract_version_id WHERE a.service_id=#serviceId#
select a.name contractName, b.contract_version_id versionId, b.version version from contract a, contract_version b where a.contract_id = b.contract_id and b.contract_version_id = #contractVersionId#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_SERVICE_BEAN.nextval from dual
insert into SERVICE_BEAN(CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_DATE,TENANT_ID
SERVICE_BEAN_ID SERVICE_BEAN_CODE SERVICE_BEAN_NAME STYLE DESCRIPTION STATE
) values(sysdate,sysdate,#tenantId#
#serviceBeanId# #serviceBeanCode# #serviceBeanName# #style# #description# #state# )

select SEQ_SERVICE_BEAN_2_SERVICE.nextval from dual
insert into SERVICE_BEAN_2_SERVICE(
SERVICE_BEAN_2_SERVICE_ID SERVICE_ID SERVICE_BEAN_ID STATE TENANT_ID
) values(
#serviceBean2ServiceId# #serviceId# #serviceBeanId# #state# #tenantId# )
sqlMap.update: update SERVICE set CONTRACT_VERSION_ID=#contractVersionId#, SERVICE_CN_NAME=#serviceCnName#, SERVICE_EN_NAME=#serviceEnName#, SERVICE_VERSION=#serviceVersion#, LASTEST_DATE=#lastestDate#, IS_PUBLISHED=#isPublished#, CREATE_DATE=#createDate#, SERVICE_TYPE=#serviceType#, SERVICE_CODE=#serviceCode#, STATE=#state#, SERVICE_DESC=#serviceDesc#, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW=#defaultMsgFlow# where SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
update SERVICE set STATE=#state# where SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from SERVICE where CONTRACT_VERSION_ID=#contractVersionId#

SELECT SERVICE_ID as serviceId,SERVICE_VERSION as serviceVersion,CONTRACT_VERSION_ID as contractVersionId, SERVICE_CN_NAME as serviceCnName,SERVICE_EN_NAME as serviceEnName,SERVICE_CODE as serviceCode, STATE as state, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW as defaultMsgFlow FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RECNO, SERVICE_ID,CONTRACT_VERSION_ID,SERVICE_VERSION,SERVICE_EN_NAME,SERVICE_CN_NAME,SERVICE_CODE,STATE, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW FROM (SELECT * FROM service where CONTRACT_VERSION_ID=#contractVersionId# ORDER BY SERVICE_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#startRow# + #rows# - 1) ORDER BY ROWNUM) WHERE RECNO BETWEEN #startRow# AND (#startRow# + #rows# - 1)
select S.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID as contractVersionId from service S where (S.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID like '%'||#contractVersionId#||'%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY CONTRACT_VERSION_ID ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT CONTRACT_VERSION_ID CONTRACT_VERSION_ID,CONTRACT_ID CONTRACT_ID , VERSION VERSION , CREATE_TIME CREATE_TIME , IS_NEED_CHECK IS_NEED_CHECK, STATE STATE, EFF_DATE EFF_DATE , EXP_DATE EXP_DATE, DESCRIPTOR DESCRIPTOR FROM CONTRACT_VERSION ) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT NODE_DESC_ID as nodeDescId,TCP_CTR_F_ID as tcpCtrFId,NODE_NAME as nodeName,NODE_CODE as nodeCode,NODE_PATH as nodePath,NODE_TYPE as nodeType,NODE_LENGTH_CONS as nodeLengthCons, NODE_TYPE_CONS as nodeTypeCons,NODE_NUMBER_CONS as nodeNumberCons,NEVL_CONS_TYPE as nevlConsType,NEVL_CONS_VALUE as nevlConsValue,NEVL_CONS_DESC as nevlConsDesc,IS_NEED_CHECK as isNeedCheck,IS_NEED_SIGN as isNeedSign,'closed' as state,CREATE_TIME as createTime,LASTEST_TIME as lastestTime,DESCRIPTION as description FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RECNO, NODE_DESC_ID,TCP_CTR_F_ID,NODE_NAME,NODE_CODE,NODE_PATH,NODE_TYPE,NODE_LENGTH_CONS, NODE_TYPE_CONS,NODE_NUMBER_CONS,NEVL_CONS_TYPE,NEVL_CONS_VALUE,NEVL_CONS_DESC,IS_NEED_CHECK,IS_NEED_SIGN,STATE,CREATE_TIME,LASTEST_TIME,DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT * FROM NODE_DESC where NODE_DESC.NODE_PATH='\' ORDER BY NODE_DESC_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#startRow# + #rows# - 1) ORDER BY ROWNUM) WHERE RECNO BETWEEN #startRow# AND (#startRow# + #rows# - 1)
select count(*) from NODE_DESC where NODE_DESC.NODE_PATH='\'

select * from directory a where (a.fa_dir_id is null or (select count(*) from directory b where b.dir_id = a.FA_DIR_ID and b.dir_type = a.dir_type) = 0) and (a.dir_type = 1 or a.dir_type = 0) and a.tenant_id=#tenantId#
select * from DIRECTORY a where a.fa_dir_id=#id# and (a.dir_type=1 or a.dir_type=0)
select * from BIZ_FUNCTION a where a.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and a.BIZ_BIZ_FUNCTION_ID is null
select * from BIZ_FUNCTION a where a.BIZ_BIZ_FUNCTION_ID=#id#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RECNO,VERSION, SERVICE_ID,CONTRACT_VERSION_ID,SERVICE_VERSION,SERVICE_EN_NAME,SERVICE_CN_NAME,SERVICE_CODE,STATE, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW,MESSAGE_FLOW_NAME FROM( select f.VERSION, b.SERVICE_ID,b.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID,b.SERVICE_VERSION,b.SERVICE_EN_NAME,b.SERVICE_CN_NAME,b.SERVICE_CODE,b.STATE, b.DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW,m.MESSAGE_FLOW_NAME from contract_version f ,contract c,service b left join MESSAGE_FLOW m on b.default_msg_flow=m.MESSAGE_FLOW_ID where b.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID=f.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID and f.CONTRACT_ID=c.CONTRACT_ID and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
b.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = #contractVersionId#
f.version like '%'||#contractVersion#||'%'
b.SERVICE_CODE like '%'||#serviceCode#||'%'
b.SERVICE_CN_NAME like '%'||#serviceCnName#||'%'
c.NAME like '%'||#contractName#||'%'
c.CODE like '%'||#contractCode#||'%'
b.STATE = #state#
ORDER BY SERVICE_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#startRow# + #rows# - 1) ORDER BY ROWNUM ) WHERE RECNO BETWEEN #startRow# AND (#startRow# + #rows# - 1)

select count(*) from service b
b.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = #contractVersionId#
b.SERVICE_CODE = #serviceCode#
b.SERVICE_CN_NAME = #serviceCnName#
b.STATE = #state#
b.TENANT_ID = #tenantId#

SELECT SERVICE_ID as serviceId,SERVICE_VERSION as serviceVersion,CONTRACT_VERSION_ID as contractVersionId, SERVICE_CN_NAME as serviceCnName,SERVICE_EN_NAME as serviceEnName,SERVICE_CODE as serviceCode, STATE as state, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW as defaultMsgFlow FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RECNO, SERVICE_ID,CONTRACT_VERSION_ID,SERVICE_VERSION,SERVICE_EN_NAME,SERVICE_CN_NAME,SERVICE_CODE,STATE, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW FROM ( select * from service b WHERE b.tenant_id=#tenantId#
b.SERVICE_ID in (select c.SERVICE_ID from DIR_SER_LIST c where c.DIR_ID = #dirTreeNode# )
b.SERVICE_ID in (select c.SERVICE_ID from FUNC_2_SERVICE c where c.biz_function_ID = #func2SerId# )
ORDER BY SERVICE_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#startRow# + #rows# - 1) ORDER BY ROWNUM ) WHERE RECNO BETWEEN #startRow# AND (#startRow# + #rows# - 1)
select * from MESSAGE_FLOW
select S.NAME as name,s.CONTRACT_ID as contractId from CONTRACT S where (S.NAME like '%'||#name#||'%')
select * from directory a start with a.dir_id=#dirId# connect by prior a.fa_dir_id = a.dir_id order by dir_id asc
select * from DIR_SER_LIST a where a.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
select a.DIR_NAME from DIRECTORY a where a.DIR_ID=#dirId#
select * from biz_function b start with b.biz_function_id = #funcId# connect by prior b.biz_function_id = b.biz_biz_function_id order by BIZ_FUNCTION_ID asc
select * from FUNC_2_SERVICE a where a.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
select a.NAME from BIZ_FUNCTION a where a.BIZ_FUNCTION_ID=#funcId#
select a.API_ID as apiId , a.IS_NEED_USER_AUTH as isNeedUserAuth,a.API_DESC as apiDesc,a.API_METHOD as apiMethod from API a where a.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
sqlMap.update:
update API a
a.IS_NEED_USER_AUTH=#isNeedUserAuth#
a.api_method=#apiMethod#
a.api_name=#apiName#
a.API_DESC=#apiDesc#
where a.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
sqlMap.select: select * from COMM_PROTOCAL

SELECT comm_pro_cd comm_pro_cd ,to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') create_time,state state,to_char(lastest_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') lastest_time,ser_tech_impl_id ser_tech_impl_id,service_cn_name service_cn_name,service_code service_code,name name,code code, attr_spec_value attr_spec_value,SERVICE_ID SERVICE_ID,TECH_IMPL_ID TECH_IMPL_ID, ORG_ID ORG_ID,TECH_IMPL_NAME TECH_IMPL_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RECNO, comm_pro_cd,create_time,state,lastest_time,ser_tech_impl_id,service_cn_name,service_code,name,attr_spec_value, SERVICE_ID,TECH_IMPL_ID,CODE,ORG_ID,TECH_IMPL_NAME FROM (select c.comm_pro_cd, a.create_time, a.state, a.lastest_time, a.ser_tech_impl_id, b.service_cn_name, b.service_code, d.name, ttt.attr_spec_value, a.SERVICE_ID, a.TECH_IMPL_ID, d.CODE, d.ORG_ID, c.TECH_IMPL_NAME from SER_TECH_IMPL a, SERVICE b, TECH_IMPL c, COMPONENT d, (SELECT tt.tech_impl_id, aaa.state state, aaa.service_id service_id, to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(tt.attr_spec_value)) attr_spec_value FROM TECH_IMP_ATT tt, ser_tech_impl aaa WHERE tt.tech_impl_id = aaa.tech_impl_id GROUP BY tt.tech_impl_id,aaa.state,aaa.service_id) ttt where a.service_id = b.service_id and a.tech_impl_id = c.tech_impl_id and c.component_id = d.component_id and ttt.tech_impl_id = c.tech_impl_id and ttt.service_id = b.service_id
ttt.service_id=#serviceId#
c.component_id=#componentId#
d.org_id=#orgId#
c.comm_pro_cd=#commProCd#
ttt.tech_impl_id=#techImplId#
a.state=#state#
ORDER BY ser_tech_impl_id DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#startRow# + #rows# - 1) ORDER BY ROWNUM) WHERE RECNO BETWEEN #startRow# AND (#startRow# + #rows# - 1)

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RECNO, comm_pro_cd,create_time,state,lastest_time,ser_tech_impl_id,service_cn_name,service_code,name,code,attr_spec_value FROM (select c.comm_pro_cd, a.create_time, a.state, a.lastest_time, a.ser_tech_impl_id, b.service_cn_name, b.service_code, d.name, d.code, ttt.attr_spec_value from SER_TECH_IMPL a, SERVICE b, TECH_IMPL c, COMPONENT d, (SELECT tt.tech_impl_id, aaa.state state, aaa.service_id service_id, to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(tt.attr_spec_value)) attr_spec_value FROM TECH_IMP_ATT tt, ser_tech_impl aaa WHERE tt.tech_impl_id = aaa.tech_impl_id GROUP BY tt.tech_impl_id,aaa.state,aaa.service_id) ttt where a.service_id = b.service_id and a.tech_impl_id = c.tech_impl_id and c.component_id = d.component_id and ttt.tech_impl_id = c.tech_impl_id and ttt.service_id = b.service_id
a.service_id=#serviceId#
c.component_id=#componentId#
d.org_id=#orgId#
c.comm_pro_cd=#commProCd#
a.tech_impl_id=#techImplId#
a.state=#state#
ORDER BY ser_tech_impl_id DESC ))

select count(*) ALLNUM from ( select cc.name, cc2c.cycle_value cycletypename, cc2c.effect_state statename, cc2c.cutms_value valuename, cc2c.* from CTL_COUNTERMS_2_TECH cc2c, CONTROL_COUNTERMS cc where cc2c.cc_cd = cc.cc_cd and cc2c.TECH_IMPL_ID =#techImplId# )

select * from (select row_number() over( order by CC_CD desc ) rn , newtab.* from ( select cc.name, cc2c.cycle_value cycletypename, cc2c.effect_state statename, to_char(cc2c.cutms_value) || cc.cutms_unit valuename, cc2c.TECH_IMPL_ID TECH_IMPL_ID, cc2c.cc_cd cc_cd, cc2c.cutms_value cutms_value, cc2c.effect_state effect_state, cc2c.cycle_type cycle_type, cc2c.cycle_value cycle_value, to_char(cc2c.CONFI_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') CONFI_TIME from CTL_COUNTERMS_2_TECH cc2c, CONTROL_COUNTERMS cc where cc2c.cc_cd = cc.cc_cd and cc2c.TECH_IMPL_ID =#techImplId# ) newtab ) where rn between #pro# and #end#
select seq_ser_tech_impl.nextval from dual

select c.comm_pro_cd, a.create_time, a.state, a.lastest_time, a.ser_tech_impl_id, b.service_cn_name, b.service_code, d.name componentName, ttt.attr_spec_value, a.SERVICE_ID, a.TECH_IMPL_ID, d.CODE, d.ORG_ID, e.NAME orgName, e.ORG_CODE, c.TECH_IMPL_NAME from SER_TECH_IMPL a, SERVICE b, TECH_IMPL c, COMPONENT d, org e, (select tech_impl_id, to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(tt.attr_spec_value)) attr_spec_value from TECH_IMP_ATT tt group by tech_impl_id) ttt where a.service_id = b.service_id and a.tech_impl_id = c.tech_impl_id and c.component_id = d.component_id and e.org_id = d.ORG_ID and ttt.tech_impl_id = c.tech_impl_id and a.ser_tech_impl_id=#serTechImplId#
select ATTR_SPEC.ATTR_SPEC_ID from ATTR_SPEC where ATTR_SPEC.ATTR_SPEC_CODE=#attrSpecCode#

select c.service_version as serviceVersion,c.service_en_name as serviceEnName from service c where (c.service_version=#serviceVersion# or c.service_en_name=#serviceEnName# or c.service_code=#serviceCode# )
c.service_id!=#serviceId#

select c.biz_function_id as bizFunctionId,c.name,c.code from biz_function c where c.code=#code#
c.biz_function_id!=#bizFunctionId#

SELECT SERVICE_ID as serviceId, SERVICE_VERSION as serviceVersion, CONTRACT_VERSION_ID as contractVersionId, SERVICE_CN_NAME as serviceCnName, SERVICE_EN_NAME as serviceEnName, SERVICE_CODE as serviceCode, STATE as state, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW as defaultMsgFlow from service a WHERE a.tenant_id=#tenantId# and a.service_id not IN(select b.SERVICE_ID from DIR_SER_LIST b UNION select c.SERVICE_ID from FUNC_2_SERVICE c)
SELECT count(*) from service a WHERE a.tenant_id=#tenantId# and a.service_id not IN(select b.SERVICE_ID from DIR_SER_LIST b UNION select c.SERVICE_ID from FUNC_2_SERVICE c)
SELECT b.message_flow_id messFlowId, b.message_flow_name messFlowName FROM service a, message_flow b WHERE a.default_msg_flow = b.message_flow_id AND a.service_id =#serviceId#
select i.TECH_IMPL_NAME from TECH_IMPL i,SER_TECH_IMPL s where i.TECH_IMPL_ID = s.TECH_IMPL_ID and s.SER_TECH_IMPL_ID =#serTechImplId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into message_flow (message_flow_id, message_flow_name, first_endpoint_id, create_time, state, lastest_time, descriptor) values (#message_Flow_Id#, #message_Flow_Name#, #first_Endpoint_Id#, sysdate, #state#, sysdate, #descriptor#)

insert into service_route_config (route_id, route_policy_id, from_endpoint_id, to_endpoint_id, message_flow_id, syn_asyn, state, create_date, lastest_date, map_Code,service_route_config_code) values (#route_Id#, #route_Policy_Id#, #from_Endpoint_Id#, #to_Endpoint_Id#, #message_Flow_Id#, #syn_Asyn#, #state#, sysdate, sysdate, #map_Code#,sys_guid())
sqlMap.select: select $sequenceName$.Nextval from dual
select attr_spec_id from ATTR_SPEC where attr_spec_code = #aPIachieve# and tenant_id = #tenantId#
select ser_spec_va from SERVICE_ATT where service_id=#serviceId# and attr_spec_id=#attrSpecId#
sqlMap.update: update SERVICE_ATT set ser_spec_va=#serSpecVa# where service_id=#serviceId# and attr_spec_id=#attrSpecId#
update SERVICE set DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW = #messageFlowId# where SERVICE_ID in (select i.SERVICE_ID from SER_TECH_IMPL i where i.SER_TECH_IMPL_ID=#serTechImplId#)
sqlMap.select:
select SER_INVOKE_INS_ID as serInvokeInsId,MESSAGE_FLOW_ID as messageFlowId,COMPONENT_ID as componentId,SERVICE_ID as serviceId, SER_INVOKE_INS_NAME as serInvokeInsName,CREATE_DATE as createDate,STATE as state,LASTEST_DATE as lastestDate,SER_INVOKE_INS_DESC as serInvokeInsDesc from SER_INVOKE_INS where STATE = 'A'
COMPONENT_ID=#componentId# SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#

select SERVICE_ID as serviceId, SERVICE_VERSION as serviceVersion, CONTRACT_VERSION_ID as contractVersionId, SERVICE_CN_NAME as serviceCnName, SERVICE_EN_NAME as serviceEnName, SERVICE_CODE as serviceCode, STATE as state, SERVICE_TYPE as serviceType, SERVICE_DESC as serviceDesc, CREATE_DATE as createDate, IS_PUBLISHED as isPublished, SERVICE_PRIORITY as servicePriority, SERVICE_TIMEOUT as serviceTimeout, DEFAULT_MSG_FLOW as defaultMsgFlow from SERVICE
SERVICE_ID=#serviceId# CONTRACT_VERSION_ID=#contractVersionId# SERVICE_CODE=#serviceCode# STATE=#state#
order by SERVICE_ID desc
sqlMap.update: UPDATE service SET state = #serviceState# WHERE service_id = (SELECT service_id FROM ser_invoke_ins WHERE ser_invoke_ins_id = #ser_invoke_ins_id#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT state FROM service WHERE service_id = (SELECT service_id FROM ser_invoke_ins WHERE ser_invoke_ins_id = #ser_invoke_ins_id#)
